Stocks end higher 
2019-10-15
Shanghai stocks rose more than 1 percent yesterday, led by gains among financial and electronics companies. The Shanghai Composite Index jumped 1.15 percent to close at 3,007.88 points. The government has announced a timetable for the opening of futures, brokerage and mutual fund sectors to foreign investors. China Everbright Bank added 6.73 percent to 4.6 yuan (US$0.65) and Nanhua Futures climbed 4.97 percent to 30.02 yuan.
